meanings.definition: A plant belonging to the class Sphenopsida.
meanings.sent1: The ancient sphenopsid grew tall in the prehistoric forest.
meanings.sent2: Botanists study the structure of the sphenopsid to understand its growth patterns.
meanings.sent3: The sphenopsid decided to throw a party for all the other plants in the garden.
meanings.sent4: In the dense jungle, the sphenopsid stood out like a green tower among the other plants.
meanings.sent5: Children love to learn about the sphenopsid in science class due to its unique features.

meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of plants in the class Sphenopsida.
meanings.sent1: The sphenopsid leaves were long and slender, capturing the sunlight effectively.
meanings.sent2: The researcher identified the sphenopsid features in the fossil record.
meanings.sent3: The sphenopsid dance at the botanical ball was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as strong as the sphenopsid roots digging deep into the soil.
meanings.sent5: The sphenopsid fragrance filled the air, attracting bees and butterflies to the garden.
